title: Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery               Photo Gallery                    Mineral King   3 Photos            Kings Canyon Park Tour   14 Photos            Sequoia Park Tour   19 Photos              Ladybug Trail   6 Photos            Wilderness Trails   3 Photos            Sawtooth Trail   5 Photos              Middle Fork Trail   3 Photos            Public Information Office   27 Photos            Wildlife   4 Photos  Wildlife            Wilderness Trails   3 Photos  Photos specific to individual wilderness trails          Winter   3 Photos  Snowy winter photos of the parks          Park Tours   16 Photos  See highlights from Sequoia and Kings Canyon National Parks            Sequoias   7 Photos  Photos of mid-elevation conifer belt, especially giant sequoias          Foothills   12 Photos  Foothills photos          High Sierra   12 Photos  Photos at or above treeline            Mineral King   3 Photos  Photos of the unique Mineral King subalpine valley and surrounding areas
